content: materials to make 3 pot holders in any combination of striped and colorblock you will need 2 balls of purl soho s 100-gram cotton chirp dk 1 100% peruvian pima cotton yarn each ball of this light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 232 yards/ 100 grams approximately 144 total yards required per pot holder - color a 1 ball approximately 77 70 total yards required for striped colorblock versions - color b 1 ball approximately 67 74 total yards required for striped colorblock versions you ll also need - us 4 3 5 mm 16-inch circular knitting needles 2 - a set of us 4 double pointed needles 3 or 32-inch circular needles for magic loop 4 - stitch markers 5 including 1 unique for our pot holders we used these color combinations chartreuse yellow + golden honey heirloom white + campfire orange and heirloom white + chartreuse yellow for the in-process colorblock version making two of the same consider switching colors a and b for variation gauge 23 stitches and 46 rounds 23 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch note to be extra sure you ll have enough yarn be sure to check your gauge and reuse your swatch yarn size finished dimensions approximately 7 inches square designed by purl soho designer hiromi glover 6 see even more of hiromi s work on her instagram 7 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-chirp-dk html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/magic-loop/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_markers html 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 7 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
